nodes.text: The Chandrilan seaside location of Junari Point was home to a bar that was frequented by the former Imperial loyalty officer–turned–New Republic operative Sinjir Rath Velus and his boyfriend Conder Kyl following the Battle of Endor. The bar was also the site of a brawl between Velus and two patrons Mister Browscar and Miss Scowlface, who disliked Imperials.
